title: (BUG) Can't click on "See more stats"

embed.description: what happened to see more stats option? cant click it for 2weeks or something...

body:
For the past week i haven't been able to click on the "See more stats" option under Leagues. The box is greyed out and after refreshing or restarting the client it is still not working. Link also shows other people not able to click on the option. Please fix this bug :D

Edit: If anyone else is has this issue, please post in comments below and hopefully we can get a solution soon

replies.body: If you click on another Summoner and then back on your own name, are you able to click on "See more stats"? Also, it's best if you lodge your report in the [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) sub-boards so that the dev team can see it and resolve any issues.
I have tried that and it doesn't work. For me, i can't see stats for any summoner
yea it still doesnt work for me either
this only worked in season 5... didnt work for me this season tho
Yeah, it's still down, and I'm guessing it'll be down until Solo Queue Ranked comes back up. I'll see if I can get some more information for you guys. Sorry about that!

This!
Im on euw and i have exactly the same problem. I tried to log in on 2 different pc's but i couldnt click on it on both pc's. I hope there will be a fix soon
Same to me. fix  pls

> [{quoted}](name=Roska,realm=EUNE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=7JOlAhZh,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-01-30T13:24:15.980+0000)
>
> Same to me. fix  pls

same here
Its been 3 months and still no fix :(
Same to me :-)
my freinds ad I have the same pronlem :C
BUMP, same problem here since the start of the season.
I've got the same problem, as does everyone I know
still not working, RIOT please why wont you answer this? i need this.
Same in EUW!
Same for me, can't click it for like a month. :(
still not fixed.
Same problem with me. Still can't click this button. It's grayed out.
Is there any place where Riot put an ETA on this?
I am also having the same problem. Please Fix RITO! TY
Same here FIX!
me too{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Same with me.... Really annoying :(

Just to help our chances of getting this fixed, I posted a discussion on the "Report a Bug" Boards, and also put this board as a reference link, however because I didn't want to show my entire screen, I don't have a reference picture because I don't know how to crop one :/ So if anyone could reply to this with a picture of the gray "See More Stats" button, or better yet a video of you pressing the button and it not working, than that would be great. 

(I know no one can do anything with me sharing my screen but I'd rather not, I'm very paranoid)

You can check out the discussion here - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/QBxBhes4-bug-client-cant-press-on-see-more-stats-in-your-profile-under-leagues

Please bring this discussion to attention, and my discussion to attention to get this fixed!

And no I'm not trying to get people to look at my discussions, it's just more likely they'll pay attention to a bug or the "Report a Bug" boards.
ye it doesnt seem to work for the last couple weeks ... its greyed out and stays like that nomatter what

bump
anything happening with this? I'm disappointed I can't check my stats this season. Maybe a rework coming for it??
Ever since records were delated and new season started I am having the same problem. It's pretty anoying I have 100+games played and can't see how I am doing with certain champs... Please fix
Same applies to me. I would click on other sumoners go to other leagues, but it still wouldn't let me view the stats of anyone, regardless of what I do.
It doesn't work for me either.
Ive got this problem too
Ive been having this problem since 6.1 wanted to check my fiora stats after my placement games and it wasn't letting me.  Dont even know how many games ive played with her
Same!!!

same issue 
cant click on it
